product_name: Big Agnes Jack Rabbit SL3 Footprint
long_description: Used underneath your Big Agnes Jack Rabbit SL3 tent, this coated nylon footprint extends the tent's life by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear during your outdoor adventures. Sizing specific to the tent helps prevent water from pooling between the tent and footprint in rainy weather. Webbing stake-outs at corners allow easy attachment.
short_description: Used underneath your Big Agnes Jack Rabbit SL3 tent, this coated nylon footprint extends the tent's life by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear during your outdoor adventures.
